Author: throwawaytruerateme9
Text: yeah the difference isnt drastic, it literally all came from my tits and ass. im 10lbs lighter than an old thinspo, the same stats as barbara palvin. i look heavier than the person im 10lbs lighter than, and smaller than barbara. the number literally means nothing.  i try to be aware of orthorexia symptoms and im pretty good at recognising and checking ‘crazy person shit’ behaviours and thoughts so im feeling good about it :)

Author: androjennous
Text: 1) I’m also 5’8 and have done the 20IB difference and literally no one noticed. It all has to do with how you carry the weight.  2) don’t stress too much about developing ortho until you start feeling like you can’t stop and are out of control with how much you exercise and what foods you consume. If having a rest day and a “nonhealthy” food item sends you into a total panic (over exercising, strict dieting etc) then I would start to self check.   Hang in there, recovery looks different for everyone, and you’re on a good path so far :)
